TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationOperations extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Azure.Batch.IInheritedBehaviors

Docs.summary: Performs application-related operations on an Azure Batch account.
Gets or sets a list of behaviors that modify or customize requests to the Batch service made via this .

remarks.para: These behaviors are inherited by child objects.
Modifications are applied in the order of the collection. The last write wins.

Docs.summary: Enumerates the applications in the Batch account.
Docs.returns: An that can be used to enumerate applications asynchronously or synchronously.
Docs.remarks: This method returns immediately; the applications are retrieved from the Batch service only when the collection is enumerated. Retrieval is non-atomic; applications are retrieved in pages during enumeration of the collection.
